select ro.org_name||'-'||po.org_name||'-'||o.org_name adgroupName, o.org_id orgId, o.org_name orgName, s.emp_id userId, s.emp_name userName, s.emp_code userCode, s.emp_mobile_phone empMobilePhone, s.bus_mobilephone busMobilePhone, s.st_mobile stMobile, s.emp_email userEmail, p.emp_post_name empPostName, ss.station_name stationName from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info s left join basis.basis_tb_org o on s.org_id = o.org_id left join basis.basis_tb_org po on o.org_parent_id = po.org_id left join basis.basis_tb_org ro on po.org_parent_id = ro.org_id left join basis.basis_tb_emp_post p on p.emp_post_id=s.emp_post_id left join basis.basis_tb_station_user u on s.emp_id=u.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_stations ss on u.station_id=ss.station_id where u.is_main_station ='Y' and s.emp_state in ('Y','S')
s.emp_code like #userCode,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.org_id = #orgId#
s.org_id in (select oo.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org oo start with oo.org_id =#orgId# connect by nocycle prior oo.org_id = oo.org_parent_id)

select count(s.emp_id) from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info s left join basis.basis_tb_org o on s.org_id = o.org_id left join basis.basis_tb_emp_post p on p.emp_post_id=s.emp_post_id left join basis.basis_tb_station_user u on s.emp_id=u.user_id left join basis.basis_tb_stations ss on u.station_id=ss.station_id where u.is_main_station ='Y' and s.emp_state in ('Y','S')
s.emp_code like #userCode,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.emp_name like #userName,handler=wildcard# escape '\'
s.org_id = #orgId#
s.org_id in (select oo.org_id from basis.basis_tb_org oo start with oo.org_id =#orgId# connect by nocycle prior oo.org_id = oo.org_parent_id)
select o.org_name orgName from basis.basis_tb_org o where o.org_id = #orgId#

select o.org_name orgName, s.emp_name userName, s.emp_mobile_phone empMobilePhone, s.bus_mobilephone busMobilePhone, s.st_mobile stMobile from basis.basis_tb_salesemp_info s left join basis.basis_tb_org o on s.org_id = o.org_id where s.emp_state in ('Y','S') and (s.emp_name=#_parameter# or s.emp_mobile_phone=#_parameter# or s.bus_mobilephone=#_parameter# or s.st_mobile=#_parameter# )
